ComicInfo.Summary: After spending a little "quality" time with the stripper, Sugar, Deathblow is attacked by killer priests who only succeed in shooting his "date." Trickle slaughters an orphanage full of kids trying to kill the chosen child but Sister Mary has already escaped with Christopher. Michael has a Latin book translated that talks of the Brotherhood of the Cross and the healing power of the Holy Grail. Gabrielle visits Mike and talks to him about his terminal cancer. The Black Angel attacks and takes the symbols that will resurrect the four horsemen of the apocalypse.
